turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about IBM Application Performance Management.
turn.1: What is the meaning of IBM Application Performance Management?
turn.2: IBM Application Performance Management IBM Application Performance Management is an offering that enables IT operations and DevOps and personnel to detect, isolate and diagnose problems in their hybrid cloud development and production environments.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The solution is part of the IBM IT Service Management portfolio, which is a key component of IBM Cloud solutions.
turn.5: What is the significance of this?
turn.6: The offering provides capabilities such as End User Management (EUM), Application Discovery, Application Diagnostics, Transaction profiling and IT Operations Analytics.
turn.7: What else is known about this?
turn.8: IBM Application Performance Management solutions are available in both SaaS (software-as-a-service), hybrid and on-premises delivery models.
turn.10: IBM Application Performance Management was a part of IBM Tivoli brand until 2013.
turn.11: What is the overview of the article?
turn.12: IBM IT Service Management ( ITSM) portfolio is the umbrella offering which provides end to end visibility, control and automation for IT staff to manage their company's business applications and services on-premises and in the cloud.
